## load data

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

Report should:
• be written in a scientific writing style.
• around 30’000 characters, not exceed 50’000 (including spaces)
• typically include text, maps, plots, appendices, code and references.
• be written using Quarto (see sample File in the template Repo)

```{r}
1 + 1
```
